test.js(1,32): error TS2694: Namespace '"mod1"' has no exported member 'C'.
test.js(2,13): error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.


==== mod1.js (0 errors) ====
    class C {
        s() { }
    }
    module.exports.C = C
    
==== test.js (2 errors) ====
    /** @typedef {import('./mod1').C} X */
                                   ~
!!! error TS2694: Namespace '"mod1"' has no exported member 'C'.
    /** @param {X} c */
                ~
!!! error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.
    function demo(c) {
        c.s
    }
